title: Makar Sankranti 2017: Yellow Outfits To Flaunt Your Style
text:
By Aditi Ray January 10, 2017 
Whatever your age, we bet that the mere mention of Makar Sankranti gets you all excited! And why not? The first festival of the new year, Makar Sankranti takes us back to those lovely childhood memories of gorging on yummy til ke laddu and chikki and watching our cousins cut each other’s manja in a fierce battle of kites. 
Be it Sankranti in Maharashtra, Pongal in Tamil Nadu or Lohri in Punjab, this auspicious festival is celebrated across India with much fervour and joy. Although every region follows a different set of rituals to celebrate the harvest festival, yellow is a colour that’s commonly associated with Sankranti. Considered highly auspicious for new beginnings, yellow is the colour to flaunt for Makar Sankranti 2017 . If you don’t have enough yellow outfits in your closet to wear this Sankranti, here are some amazing finds that work wonders for every style. Take a quick look here. 
1. White and yellow half and half saree 
Here’s a stylish way to celebrate Sankranti, for those who love the understated look! This white and yellow half and half saree with delicate thread work elevates your glam quotient with its subtle elegance. Go easy on the accessories and let this lovely saree help you turn heads as you step out this Sankranti. 
2. Tussar silk saree 
Simple yet classy, this yellow Tussar silk saree from our collection is hard to overlook. The light fabric, soothing colours and breathtaking designs make it a wardrobe essential for every woman. Top off your look with an elegant hairdo and exquisite temple jewellery . 
3. Red and yellow georgette saree 
This yellow saree with an embellished red border is a must-have this Sankranti! The rich colours are enhanced by intricate embroidery to give it a regal charm. This beautiful piece comes with an equally appealing brasso blouse piece. A puffed bun and statement earrings is all you need to finish your look. 
You Might Also Like: Ravishing Red Sarees To Sizzle Your Way Into 2017 
4. Yellow and green straight suit 
Add a glorious burst of colour to your wardrobe with this vibrant yellow straight suit paired with a green churidar . With a printed dupatta , this outfit is sure make you the life of the celebrations this Sankranti. Opt for a simple look with green and golden earrings. 
5. Yellow and maroon salwar suit 
6. Embroidered yellow straight suit 
Wear the shade of fun with this lovely yellow straight suit. The black and green embroidery on the kurta is sure to make it a hit this Sankranti. Sober and classy, this exquisitely embroidered salwar suit wraps you up in regal charm. A great outfit for Sankranti celebrations, it is sure to get you all the attention. 
Shop for yellow salwar suits . 
7. Blue and yellow lehenga 
If this one catches your eye, we’ve got to say that you have good taste! The glamorous appeal of the rich blue and soft yellow is enhanced by the delicate embroidery on the flare, making it an instant hit with ladies. An elegant hairdo and statement earrings is just what you need to make an impression this Sankranti. 
8. Embroidered lehenga 
Ornate zari work, a lovely silhouette and elegant colours make this lehenga a must-have for your Sankranti collection. Drop the necklace; go for statement earrings and a maang tika along with a hairstyle that suits your face, to complete the look. 
9. Raw silk lehenga 
Love lehengas, but can’t handle those heavy ones? Here’s the answer to your problem! Crafted with silk, this printed lehenga paired with a cropped pink blouse is perfect for those who love the minimalist look! Bright and chirpy, this lehenga is sure to cheer up anyone who looks at you!
